sentences.sContent: Can you adduce any reason for His strange behavior?
sentences.sContent_eng: Can you adduce any reason for His strange behavior?
sentences.sCn: 你是否能举出任何理由来说明他的奇特行为？

sentences.sContent: When you adduce evidence of this nature, you must be sure of your sources.
sentences.sContent_eng: When you adduce evidence of this nature, you must be sure of your sources.
sentences.sCn: 你必须引用许多例证来证明你的观点。

remMethod.val: ad (做) + duc (引导) + e → 举例做引导 → 举出 (例证)

words.tran: 引用，引证；内转；内收作用

trans.tranOther: to give facts or reasons in order to prove that something is true
